sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM005', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM , C.STRCT_FMT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F C WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = C.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'C'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND C.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F C WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = C.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'C'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND C.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , C.LOC , TO_CHAR(C.FCLTS_EXT) FCLTS_EXT , C.STRCT_FMT , TO_CHAR(C.UPSIDE_ALTUD) UPSIDE_ALTUD , TO_CHAR(C.UPSIDE_WD) UPSIDE_WD , TO_CHAR(C.BERTH_DPWT) BERTH_DPWT , TO_CHAR(C.PERM_WD) PERM_WD , TO_CHAR(C.APRON_WD) APRON_WD , C.APRON_PACK_KND , C.APRON_PACK_GRDNT , TO_CHAR(C.CSDHP_SHIP_SCL) CSDHP_SHIP_SCL , TO_CHAR(C.FROST_DMG_WGHT) FROST_DMG_WGHT , C.BASE_BTTM_SOIL , C.HNDL_FRGHT , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_CLBR) PILE_CLBR , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_EXT) PILE_EXT , TO_CHAR(C.PILE_QTY) PILE_QTY , C.SHEET_FILE_STNDRD , TO_CHAR(C.HYDRNT_QY) HYDRNT_QY , TO_CHAR(C.FIREPG_QY) FIREPG_QY , C.YARD_PACK_KND , TO_CHAR(C.YARD_AR) YARD_AR , C.FENDER_KND_CD , C.FENDER_PMNT_ITV , C.FENDER_FMT , C.MRPOST_STNDRD_1 , C.MRPOST_PMNT_ITV_1 , TO_CHAR(C.MRPOST_QY_1) MRPOST_QY_1 , C.MRPOST_PWR_1 , C.MRPOST_STNDRD_2 , C.MRPOST_PMNT_ITV_2 , TO_CHAR(C.MRPOST_QY_2) MRPOST_QY_2 , C.MRPOST_PWR_2 , TO_CHAR(C.BERTH) BERTH , C.STPL_HNDL_FRGHT , C.STPL_MOOR_SHIP , C.BEGIN_PT_LOC , C.END_PT_LOC , TO_CHAR(C.WD) WD , TO_CHAR(C.LT) LT , C.PACK_KND , TO_CHAR(C.PLAN_HEGH) PLAN_HEGH , C.WAVEMAIN_DIR , TO_CHAR(C.OUTER_SWAVE_SLP_RATE) OUTER_SWAVE_SLP_RATE , TO_CHAR(C.IN_SWAVE_SLP_RATE) IN_SWAVE_SLP_RATE , C.OUTER_SWAVE_COVER , C.IN_SWAVE_COVER , C.CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = C.CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD) CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F , CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F C WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = C.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
